name: NBCNews
text:
LIVE: @NBCNews Special Report: Coronavirus in the Classroom.

@lesterholtnbc provides advice and reporting for students, parents and teachers as schools begin to reopen amid the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/SmFPAWlvRo

name: NBCNews
text: When he rolled out the school opening plan, Gov. Newsom noted that the state budget allotted more than $5B to help with remote learning, and schools would be required to introduce “robust distance learning programs." https://t.co/AZiofmr0wA

name: NBCNews
text: Landlords could exploit COVID-19 victims to fast-track evictions, housing advocates say. https://t.co/wrDCcrlbGf

name: NBCNews
text: Hip hop icon RZA released a new ice cream truck jingle in collaboration with Good Humor in the hopes of replacing the iconic "Turkey in the Straw" tune that first gained popularity in American minstrel shows. https://t.co/nI9aR5fwVI

name: NBCNews
text: A new voter information hub is Facebook's latest step to to combat election-related misinformation on its platform as the Nov. 3 election nears. https://t.co/Lqtvp5z0pv

name: NBCNews
text: Leslie David Baker, best known for playing Stanley Hudson on "The Office," shares racist online abuse he says he received since announcing plans to star in a spinoff series. https://t.co/RAfPRl8ARH

name: NBCNews
text:
Fmr. presidential hopeful Pete Buttigieg and his husband Chasten will be honored by Equality California during its virtual Golden State Equality Awards celebration.

The event will be hosted by “Pose” star Angelica Ross. - @NBCOUT https://t.co/Jyq9LlHcNC

name: NBCNews
text: Opinion | Anthea Butler: "If a white man had a backstory like Harris', conservatives would openly consider him a formidable opponent and worthy of at least some respect." - @NBCNewsTHINK https://t.co/HWwV4H6EoR

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: Students share what learning in the time of coronavirus has been like and what grade they would give COVID-1… https://t.co/9D2yDFJGQo

name: NBCNews
text:
California has become the first state to surpass 600,000 coronavirus cases, data show. 

Florida has recorded 557,137 cases, and Texas, 527,715. https://t.co/WZRkK3z6WJ

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: This mom’s homeschool course on Black history takes off as parents grapple with teaching race. https://t.co/b6NVJtoBk9

name: NBCNews
text: Justice Dept. has accused Yale University of illegally discriminating against Asian American and white students in admissions, a major escalation of the Trump admin.'s attacks on affirmative action. https://t.co/7W9MwaOIe6

name: NBCNews
text:
"I would like to see that they come up with a vaccine. So this can all just be over, like a bad nightmare"

@NBCNews asked students, with their parents’ permission, to share what it’s been like to try to learn amid the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/pKaEXSKmd0

name: NBCNews
text: WATCH: Reporter asks President Trump if he regrets "all the lying" he has "done to the American people." https://t.co/OKKhlIex0I

name: NBCNews
text:
President Trump told reporters he had “heard” rumors that Sen. Harris, a Black woman and U.S.-born citizen, does not meet the requirement to serve in the White House. 

The president said he considered the rumors “very serious.” https://t.co/MFyL41qHAY

name: NBCNews
text: While states nationwide are grappling with whether to reopen schools, the impassioned debate in Iowa has resulted in car protests, resignations by longtime teachers and staff members, and some districts openly flouting Gov. Reynolds’ orders. https://t.co/809WESM7up

name: NBCNews
text: “We’re all thrown into these umbrella labels that fail to capture our complex histories...and how that’s impacted who has access to this industry and who doesn’t,” director Aurora Guerrero says. “It’s time we have conversations about these differences.” https://t.co/aITlLbofiX

name: NBCNews
text: "Boys State" is a Rorschach test. It will strike some as a galvanizing ode to the civic passion, a sign that self-governance is alive and well. It will strike others as an alarming portrait of chest-thumping masculinity and political cynicism run amok https://t.co/GgVLUXGWEQ

name: NBCNews
text:
Orange County's Board of Supervisors voted unanimously to declare Aug. 24 "Kobe Bryant Day."

Bryant, a resident of Orange County, California, wore the numbers 8 and 24 during his professional basketball career. https://t.co/sE3yylCf2U

name: NBCNews
text: The executive responsible for making sure Wells Fargo follows laws and regulations is departing after two and half years in the post. https://t.co/WBNhsozR1x

text: Speculation over the dress’s rise to the top of the internet’s “must have” list is driven in part due to the boring, dowdy clothes that have become synonymous with the coronavirus pandemic quarantine. https://t.co/PSs8dEM4lE
